definitions.definition: A horizontal component of a structure
A Tasmanian shrub or small tree whose main trunk tends to lean over and grow horizontally, Anodopetalum biglandulosum
Perpendicular to the vertical; parallel to the plane of the horizon; level, flat

definitions.example: 1667: As when the Sun new ris'n / Looks through the Horizontal misty Air — John Milton, Paradise Lost, Book 1, ll. 594-5

definitions.definition: (wine tasting) involving wines of the same vintages but from different wineries
Of an interval: having the two notes sound successively.
